use_case.title: Set Top Rule No Tabs Color for Theme

trigger.value: User wishes to set a color for Top Rule with no Tabs

use_case.basic_path:
1. User begins on Create Theme page (see PSRV-00910:Create a Theme for a Portal)
  2. User locates section of Create Theme form for Top Rule No Tabs and either selects one of the preset colors, or enters a custom value.
